author: jpsnover
body:
JPS> Save-Script trace-Variable -verbose -Path t.ps1 -Force
VERBOSE: Using the provider 'PowerShellGet' for searching packages.
VERBOSE: The -Repository parameter was not specified.  PowerShellGet will use all of the registered repositories.
VERBOSE: Getting the provider object for the PackageManagement Provider 'NuGet'.
VERBOSE: The specified Location is 'https://www.powershellgallery.com/api/v2/items/psscript/' and PackageManagementProvider is 'NuGet'.
VERBOSE: Searching repository 'https://www.powershellgallery.com/api/v2/items/psscript/FindPackagesById()?id='trace-Variable'' for ''.
VERBOSE: Total package yield:'1' for the specified package 'trace-Variable'.
VERBOSE: Folder 'D:\jsnover\OneDrive\Scripts\t.ps1' cannot be found
PackageManagement\Save-Package : Error running Save-Script cmdlet: Cannot create "D:\jsnover\OneDrive\Scripts\t.ps1" because a file or directory with the same name already exists..
At C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\Modules\PowerShellGet\1.0.0.1\PSModule.psm1:3245 char:21
+             $null = PackageManagement\Save-Package @PSBoundParameters
+                     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidArgument: (Microsoft.Power...ets.SavePackage:SavePackage) [Save-Package], Exception
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : SavePackageError,Microsoft.PowerShell.PackageManagement.Cmdlets.SavePackage

JPS> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
----                           -----                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
PSVersion                      5.1.14393.576                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
PSEdition                      Desktop                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                                                                                                                                           
BuildVersion                   10.0.14393.576                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1

comments.author: jpsnover
comments.body:
Pilot error.
-Path takes a dir not a file

title: Save-Script will not overwrite a file even if -FORCE is used (it should)
